text: The Gotham City Sirens is an American comic book series published by DC Comics. It refers to a group of female Gotham City villains that consists of Catwoman, Harley Quinn, and Poison Ivy. They were created by Paul Dini and Guillem March, first appearing in Gotham City Sirens #1. (2009). Category:DC Comics characters
title: Gotham City Sirens
